cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY18 GOVERNMENT)C RET. 3867. CABINET.THE IRAQ, TREATYTelegro.ni from the High Commi3aioner for Iraq to theSecretary of State for the Colonies; (Received Colonial Office. 6.20 p.m. 19th March 1922).(Circulated by the Secretary of. State for the Colonies).Secret and personal. March 19th.,8. Article 5 of Treaty, please see ray telegramNo.175 of March 3rd. Colonial Office alternative draftwould in my personal opinion be accepted, but I am sure that Foreign Office wording would not be accepted and would injure Faisal!s prestige vitally. This refers to your private and secret telegram of March 16th.COX.Whitehall Gardens, 3.W. March 21st, 1922..
